title: Evaluation ofIn VitroPharmacological Activities and HRLC-MS Based Profiling ofPhlogacanthus jenkinsiiC. B. Clarke.
abstract: Phlogacanthus jenkinsiiis an ethnomedicinal plant used by the people of the North East Region of India to manage various health issues including diabetes and rheumatism. The present study examines the total phenolic and flavonoid content,in vitropharmacological evaluation of the plant extract/fractions, and phytochemical characterization using HRLC-MS.
